name: briznads-helpers
description: Generic, zero-dependency* helper functions and types for use in disparate typescript projects.

scripts.clean: if [ -d dist ]; then rm -Rf dist; fi
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig-cjs.json && ./set_module_type.sh
scripts.npm_publish: npm run build && npm publish --provenance --access public
